item.title: Nicole add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Nicole add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Nicole add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "The most wasted of all days is one without laughter." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "Morning without you is a dwindled dawn." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "That it will never come again is what makes life so sweet." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Nicole add a quote by e.e. cummings
item.description: "nobody, not even the rain, has such small hands" -- e.e. cummings

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Dana Lamon
item.description: "A dream is a vision of the future, in light of the past, tainted by imagination." -- Dana Lamon

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "Because I could not stop for Death – He kindly stopped for me – The Carriage held but just Ourselves – And Immortality." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Nicole add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "If music be the food of love, play on, Give me excess of it; that surfeiting, The appetite may sicken, and so die." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Nicole add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Nicole add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "O Romeo, Romeo, wherefore art thou Romeo? Deny thy father refuse thy name, thou art thyself thou not a montegue, what is montegue? tis nor hand nor foot nor any other part belonging to a man What is in a name? That which we call a rose by any other name would smell as sweet, So Romeo would were he not Romeo called retain such dear perfection to which he owes without that title, Romeo, Doth thy name! And for that name which is no part of thee, take all thyself." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "Resist much, obey little." -- Walt Whitman

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "Failing to fetch me at first, keep encouraged. Missing me one place, search another. I stop somewhere waiting for you." -- Walt Whitman

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "I exist as I am, that is enough, If no other in the world be aware I sit content, And if each and all be aware I sit content. One world is aware, and by the far the largest to me, and that is myself, And whether I come to my own today or in ten thousand or ten million years, I can cheerfully take it now, or with equal cheerfulness, I can wait." -- Walt Whitman

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "When you're curious, you find lots of interesting things to do." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "Laughter is timeless. Imagination has no age. And dreams are forever." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "History will be kind to me for I intend to write it." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "A fanatic is one who can't change his mind and won't change the subject." -- Winston S. Churchill
